translations: 尼特（光度单位）；幼虱；一单元信息，等于1.44比特；傻瓜（同nitwit）（nit的复数）

sentences.sentence: Our complaints about this unit are no more than nits.
sentences.translation: 我们对这个单位的投诉不超过尼特。

sentences.sentence: He joked: "I got a terrible infestation of nits and I had to shave it off."
sentences.translation: 他开玩笑说道，“我的头发受到虱子们的攻击，我必须把它们清除掉！”

sentences.sentence: The finalised packaging is just a clean design that says what it needs to and effectively positions Quit Nits within the category.
sentences.translation: 最终的包装只是一个干净的设计，说什么需要和有效职位退出类别内尼特。
